Arcola Pettway (1934–1994) was an American artist associated with the Gee's Bend group of quilters.
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nkè High Museum of Art.
Ọ bụ nné ya, Deborah Young, na nna nna ya, Reverend Paul S
Nne ya zụlitere nwá nwanne nne Young, Leola Pettway
Leola kọwara Ógè ha bụ nwata dị ka ihe jupụtara na egwuregwu na njem, dị ka ịkụ azụ, ịbụ abụ na ndị ukwe ụka, na ịmepụta egwuregwu.
Young lụrụ Joseph Pettway, nwanne Lucy T
Ha nwèrè ụmụ iri na abụọ
Ha na-arụkọ ọrụ ugbo ọnụ ma Young bụ akụkụ nke otu na-abụ abụ gospel, Golden Angels.
Nne Young kụziiri nwá nwanne ya nwanyị, Leola, ka ọ buru ụzọ tee ákwà n'ihi na ọ tọrọ Young afọ isé
N'otu, ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ kụziiri Young ịkpụcha na akwa.
